functions.author: Gyver5681
functions.title: Misc Enchants v2
pages:
§lLooting I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use an emerald as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL  
 B 
 R §r

§lLooting II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two emeralds as the reagents (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
R R§r

§lLooting III:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use an emerald block as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a row of lapis along the top (L).
§lLLL
 B 
 R §r

§lKnockback I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a potato as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL  
 B 
 R §r

§lKnockback II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two poisonous potatoes as the reagents (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
R R§r

§lSharpness IV:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a flint and steel (R) and an amethyst shard (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with lapis along the top and left side (L).
§lLLL
LB 
R r§r
